duties_responsibilities.duty: Support and maintain payroll systems such as Client Employee Systems, Kronos, ADP, and other relevant interfaces.
Troubleshoot technical defects, enhancements, and regular maintenance for Payroll Operations/Processing teams.
Create and update system issue tickets, participate in cross-functional testing, and maintain Merlin/Kronos/TAP Tables.
Engage, react, and find solutions under high-pressure environments; availability to work outside business hours to support payroll processing times.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
